column5: hey guys...been a while since i last posted, but i got a question for the downrigger guys out there.  I just got my new boat (will post some pics soon) and i got two tournament walker downriggers. My question is does anybody know of any risers out there at least 8-12" high that will fit the base of the walkers.  I know there are mounts out there that get to 6", just looking for anything higher.  Thanks for the help.
Burts, Traxtech and Canon all appear to only go to 6". Looking like http://www.trojantackle.ca/index.htm might be your commercial option.
You may want to talk to dave at Trojan Tackle. He just made me a customs set for my boat. Wanst really a lot more than off the shelf.
thanks guys...i will call them tomorrow...spincast..if you dont mind...did they break the bank (pm me if preferred) i do understand if you dont want to divulge.
Yes another vote for Dave over at Trojan tackle he sure does make some great stuff  http://www.trojantackle.ca/
thanks for the link...looks like they are what i am looking for!
You can buy 9 inch risers for walker riggers for $50 each i have them on my boat  Rob
Hi this Dave from trojan...happy to help if I can...give me a cALL
